description: This header file defines a utility function `getRFCConfig` within the `Utils` namespace that retrieves RFC configuration parameters using an external function `getRFCParameter` and handles status responses.

methods.name: bool getRFCConfig(const char * paramName,RFC_ParamData_t & paramOutput)
methods.description: Inline function that retrieves RFC configuration parameters by calling `getRFCParameter` and returns true if the call is successful or returns a default value status.

ctags.name: getRFCConfig
ctags.pattern: /^inline bool getRFCConfig(const char* paramName, RFC_ParamData_t& paramOutput)$/
